summary: The implementation successfully addresses all requirements for the Poumai Poems cultural literary section. All backend CRUD operations with admin authorization, frontend display with filtering, admin management interface, navigation integration, and React Query hooks are implemented as specified. The code follows existing patterns, respects constraints, and maintains architectural consistency.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) implementing data migration logic for existing actor state
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention creating a migration system or migrating existing data structures. This appears to be infrastructure added beyond the specified requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Alert dialog for delete confirmation on poems
hallucinated_features.reason: While delete functionality is required, the BuildRequest does not specify implementing a confirmation dialog. This is a reasonable UX addition but not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Homepage redesign with cultural heritage focus and feature cards
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specifies not modifying the homepage beyond adding navigation. The diff shows significant homepage content changes focusing on Poumai cultural heritage and poetry, which was not requested.
